name: Domain of Blessing: Fires of Purification IV
description:
This ancient blessed altar is filled with Pyro-fearing monsters.
You shall earn priceless Artifacts, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.
disorder: When Vaporize is triggered, an Energy Blast will occur, dealing DMG to surrounding opponents.
When Electro-Charged is triggered, you will be hit by a powerful blast, causing your character to take DMG.
